3. @choicebykt is the simplest way to open a self-directed Roth IRA that lets you buy real bitcoin.

Since I’ve been asked a lot:

Buy stock in several companies that make products & services that *you* believe in.

Only sell if you think their products & services are trending worse. Don’t panic when the market does.

@davetroy Scarcity is indeed necessary for the reliable ongoing operation of the Bitcoin network, as there must be sufficient scarcity in order for demand to exceed supply.

Without that, the system would not be able to pay for its own thermodynamic security.

@davetroy Interesting premise. Artificial scarcity is generally considered to be enforced by a monopoly or by anti-competitive laws. Whereas bitcoin's scarcity operates on a free market; if there was agreement that supply should be higher than it could change to meet that desire.
